about_the_game:
OUR SOCIAL MEDIA:







DON'T FORGET TO ADD THIS GAME TO YOUR WISHLIST:




MASTERING THE ART OF FALCONRY:
Step into the world of Arabian falconry, where dedicated falconers nurture and train their majestic birds of prey. Discover the intricacies of falconry and try out various training techniques. Build a profound bond with your avian companions through regular exercises and expand your knowledge by learning from experienced trainers.




NURTURING AND ENHANCING YOUR FALCONS:
Embrace the responsibility of caring for the health and well-being of your falcons, providing them with proper nutrition and daily attention. Explore opportunities to enrich their lives and enhance their skills, ensuring they thrive under your watchful care.



EXPANDING YOUR FALCONRY FAMILY:
Embark on a journey to grow your falconry family, cherishing each falcon as a cherished companion with its own unique personality and abilities. Explore diverse regions to connect with these magnificent creatures and welcome them into your falconry family with open arms.



THRIVING IN FALCONRY CHALLENGES:
Compete in thrilling competitions against other falconers from around the world, showcasing the deep bond and mutual respect you share with your falcons. Strive for victory in various challenges and tournaments, while connecting with fellow enthusiasts to exchange strategies and celebrate the beauty of falconry.

name: Enter Falconry

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 / AMD FX 4350
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Core i5-3470 / AMD FX 4350
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 10400f / AMD Ryzen 7 2700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1660 / AMD RX 590
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

short_description: Enter Falconry immerses you in the captivating world of Arabian falconry, where dedicated falconers train and nurture their majestic birds of prey. Forge strong bonds with your avian companions, train them diligently, expand your collection, compete, and connect with the world's foremost trainers.
supported_languages:
English*, Arabic
*languages with full audio support
